page.title: 12HOLMESFIELD PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The whole of our area is within the jurisdiction of the{Holmesfield Parish {Council.}As it is a{rural Parish,}with no industry, the councils main concern is the{footpaths,bridleways and {fingerposts}which they maintain. There are 27 miles of footpath in Holmesfield linking the hamlets and a voluntary{Footpaths and Bridleways {Committee}has been formed to report the closure of these paths by local farmers.The upkeep of the footpaths is paid for by a set rate agreed on by the Parish Council members.The council is comprised of 9 members, meets monthly in the village hall and publishes a regular{Parish News Letter containing a diary of events and other information .There are two Parish Councillors on the local school board of governors.Plans for new building developments need Council approval.
